title: IIT Patna Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology Patna (IIT Patna)Â  has released an official notification for the recruitment of various Junior Research Fellow Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, and Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Patna Notification 2026 .
